content: Ok, well, we already agreed we're starting in Notion right? So this should be able to be stored in there as we move through this first MVP phase and can be easily moved when ready. So execution plan stays the same, we just need to add another table. I was thinking that it would be good to store things like full text of books (like if Tim Ferriss is a Thought Leader in my table, I could store all his books there and deep research, podcast transcripts, etc.) Could these be indexed in the same manner, custom to me and all the other inputs in the database?
